directors of movies: SELECT title, analogy_3cosadd_ivfadc('Godfather', 'Francis_Ford_Coppola', title) AS director FROM imdb.title WHERE analogy_3cosadd_ivfadc('Godfather', 'Francis_Ford_Coppola', title) != '' LIMIT 100
movies by continents: SELECT token, grouptoken FROM grouping_func(ARRAY(SELECT regexp_replace(title, ' ', '_', 'g') FROM imdb.title WHERE title NOT LIKE '%25''%25' LIMIT 1000), '{Europe,America}')
keywords similar to comedy: SELECT keyword, cosine_similarity(keyword, 'comedy') FROM imdb.keyword AS k INNER JOIN google_vecs ON google_vecs.word = k.keyword ORDER BY cosine_similarity(keyword, 'comedy') DESC LIMIT 10
Get tags for movies: SELECT title, ANN.word FROM imdb.title, k_nearest_neighbour_ivfadc(title.title, 5) AS ANN LIMIT 100
movies similar to \"Godfather\": SELECT ANN.word FROM knn_in('Godfather', 5, ARRAY(SELECT title::varchar(80) FROM imdb.title)) AS ANN
